briefTitle: A Study Evaluating the Safety of Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor in Participants With Cystic Fibrosis (CF)
officialTitle: A Phase 3b Open-label Study Evaluating the Safety of Elexacaftor/Tezacaftor/Ivacaftor Combination Therapy in Subjects With Cystic Fibrosis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of elexacaftor (ELX)/tezacaftor (TEZ)/ivacaftor (IVA) in participants with CF who are 12 years of age or older.

primaryOutcome.measure: Safety and Tolerability as Assessed by Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)

commonTop: Infective pulmonary exacerbation of cystic fibrosis
